page.title: 07FOUR DAYS IN JULY
page.content: During South Craven School's Project Week in July we collected information on the Cononley area for the Domesday Project. {MONDAY}was spent in Cononley doing an amenities count and land coverage survey.Between 11am and 12 noon we did a level crossing count.{ {TUESDAY}A school trip arranged to Ripon Cathedral, Fountains Abbey and Brimham Rocks, which the whole group attended. {WEDNESDAY}We returned to Cononley in the morning to take photos of the area. In the afternoon we walked up to Cononley Lead Mine also taking photos. {THURSDAY}We put all the information we had gathered into the computer. We also interviewed a girl about her home, Well Head Farm, which was then used for one of our pages.
